titles.title: Small Business Health Care Relief Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow small businesses a refundable income tax credit to offset the cost of providing health care coverage for employees.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 6/26/2008--Introduced. Small Business Health Care Relief Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain small business owners with 50 or fewer employees a refundable tax credit for the payment of a portion of the health care expenses of their employees.
